name: Cute Creature Style - tiny monsters, spirits and animals (cutecreature)
description:
About the Cute Creature style

Trained on 18 AI-generated images, this textual inversion will create cute, likable creatures.

Get Started

Download .pt file to your embeddings folder in Web UI and prompt cutecreature in your positive prompt.

if the structure of your prompt is "medium of [subject], [style]", I am sharing a list of [subjects] from the training set to get you started. Please check the version description field below.

There are two suggested ways how to use the list of subjects:

  1. Copy and paste to your StylePile X filed and prompt medium of [X] or just [X]. Make sure to set your batch to 1 because it will be multiplied by the number of values in X. This way will produce all the prompts every time.

  2. Requires wildcards extension installed. Save these values as monstersubjects.txt, copy it to your wildcards folder (table-diffusion-webui-master\extensions\stable-diffusion-webui-wildcards\wildcards) and prompt "__monstersubjects__" without the quotes. This will give you a random value from the list and will not increase the batch count.

I tested this on 6+ models and I got the best results on Deliberate, Dreamshaper, and Dreamlike Duffusion. Anime models seem to fail to deliver, but maybe I am not using the right ones.

Prompts require some fine-tuning and more imagination and there is space to try other models and style strengths.

Please share your results here and follow us here on Civitai for more

modelVersions.description:
owl-like creature  happy expression, sitting on the floor, no background

Tiny cute isometric alebrije emoji, soft smooth lighting, with bold flat colors, 3d icon clay render, 100mm lens, 3d blender render, natural environment scenery, Mexican inspired background, trending on polycount, modular constructivism, physically based rendering, geometric, centered, dynamic pose. The alebrije should be inspired by Mexican folk art and should be a combination of several different animals, such as a lion, eagle, or serpent.

sticker of a cute ghost, digital illustration, centered, dynamic, highly detailed, concept art, smooth, sharp focus, illustration, art by Nintendo

a random creature

ghost, a character in full view, analogous colors, glowing shadows, beautiful gradient, depth of field, clean image, high quality, high detail, high definition, Luminous Studio graphics engine

mushroom spirit creature

cute funny monster with ten eyes and eight arms, colorful fur and red boots

a whimsical volcano creature

a creature, intricate, silver, crystals, metallic, iridescent, rainbow, Vibrant color, vaporwave, phantasmal, hdr, duotone, high contrast
